name: Bindy Street
description: We are currently in our pre-release stage, which unfortunately has strict NDAs alongside it. However, we can say we are working on an extremely exciting mobile game that draws upon the world around us!

jobs.title: Unity3D Developer
jobs.description:
**Job Description**
We are looking for a Unity3d developer to drive the technical development of our games from inception to delivery. Your main role will be to implement game functionality translating design ideas, concepts, and requirements into a functional and engaging game. A commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and a quality product are essential. 

Your main responsibility will be the development of a new platform. You should have a track record in delivering complex projects on time and with high standard code. 

You will be working with a collaborative team, where your knowledge and advice about application architecture and the newest mobile technologies will be highly valued. Familiarity with the current gaming zeitgeist is essential, as our game draws upon modern gaming features. You’ll also help ensure solid application performance and an excellent user experience.

As you will be part of a small team, Unity3d expertise is key. 

**Responsibilities**
* Develop end-to-end solutions using the full technology stack
* Create robust, high-performance solutions on time and in budget
* Deliver secure, scalable solutions
* Design professional front end user interfaces
* Design, develop and test solutions
* Write and follow specifications
* Contribute to team discussions
* Work independently and as part of a small team
* Code ownership

**Requirements**
* Excellent C#
* Unity3d
* .NET Framework
* iOS and Android Development
* Git
* Keen eye for detail around what looks and feels good
* Passionate about games!
* Experience with client-server architecture
* Scrum/Agile
 
**Company Introduction**
Bindy Street Limited is an innovative start-up producing mobile games. This role is ideal for someone looking to be a key part of an entrepreneurial minded, self-motivated creative team. We are a growing team comprising tech, creative and business people, based in Parsons’s Green. It is a lovely part of London, and we are only a 5-minute walk from Parsons’s Green tube station. We aim to launch an experimental mobile game that involves real-world elements, drawing upon an ethos of adventure and discovery. 

Some company benefits from working with us include Company Health Insurance with AXA Business Health Select after 6 months employment, frequent home-cooked lunches, 28 holiday days, and more.

jobs.title: Full-stack .Net Developer
jobs.description:
**Job Description**

You will be responsible for the development of a new platform. The Full Stack .NET Developer will have a track record in delivering complex projects on time and with high standard code.

As a full stack developer, you should be comfortable around both front-end and back-end coding languages, development frameworks and third-party libraries. You should also be a team player with a knack for visual design and utility. As you will be part of a small team, full stack expertise is key. 

**Responsibilities**
* Develop end-to-end solutions using the full technology stack
* Create robust, high-performance solutions on time and in budget
* Deliver secure, scalable back-end solutions
* Design professional front end user interfaces
* Design, develop and test solutions
* Write and follow specifications
* Contribute to team discussions
* Work independently and as part of a small team
* Code ownership

**Requirements**
* Min 2 years experience as Full-Stack Developer
* Excellent C#
* .NET Framework
* ASP.NET MVC
* ASP Web Api
* SQL Server 
* JavaScript
* HTML
* CSS
* jQuery
* Bootstrap
* Git

Other useful skills include:
* DevOps
* AWS
* Database Design
* React
* Scrum/Agile* 

**Company Introduction**
Bindy Street Limited is an innovative start-up producing mobile games. This role is ideal for someone looking to be a key part of an entrepreneurial minded, self-motivated creative team. We are a growing team comprising tech, creative and business people, based in Parsons’s Green. It is a lovely part of London, and we are only a 5-minute walk from Parsons’s Green tube station. We aim to launch an experimental mobile game that involves real-world elements, drawing upon an ethos of adventure and discovery. 

Some company benefits from working with us include Company Health Insurance with AXA Business Health Select after 6 months employment, frequent home-cooked lunches, 28 holiday days, and more.
